TextBlock.Text: COLEUS: Friends, I am happy to report the frozen specimen we transported from Bramble Island appears to be thriving in its new habitat!
MELORAE: What wonderful news! I am glad we will not need to venture outside the <color=orange>Looming City</color> again soon, knowing now what roams there..
PLUME: My gratitude for all your hard work, my friends.
PLUME: With this specimen, we are now better equipped than ever to study and understand the mysteries of this species' behavior.
